official_title: To amend the National Summit Conference on Education Act of 1984.
short_title: National Summit Conference on Education Amendments of 1990

summary.text: National Summit Conference on Education Amendments of 1990 - Amends the National Summit Conference on Education Act of 1984 to revise congressional findings, executive committee membership, and provide for regional meetings and agenda with respect to the National Summit Conference on Education.
